text: Nɨ Negevɨn danganim mɨkɨm suam, nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akam baragh! Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Ekiam, kɨ kamaghɨn nɨ mɨgei, kɨ avitam atɨghtɨ, a nɨn aven itir temer angamtɨziba ko mɨsɨngiziba bar, a dar isigham. Eghtɨ bizitam avir ekiam amungeghan kogham. A sautɨn amadaghan ikegh mangɨ notɨn amadaghan otogham. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar, men mɨkarziba an mɨzariabar fefem bar men isigham.
